testcase.classname: Facebook Login Test Using Cucumber BDD
testcase.name: To check the login by giving negative username and positive password
testcase.system-out: Given To Configure the browser in webdriver manager.........................passed When To launch the browser our case edge browser............................passed And To check the login by entering negative username........................passed And To check the login by entering positive password........................passed And To submit the value by clicking login button............................passed Then To quit the browser after clicking the login...........................passed
